ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of MÉLANIE RAYMOND of Montréal, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years, effective May 30, 2017.
